on_entry: variable.ammo = query.is_item_name_any('slot.inventory', 0, 'addon:ammo7.62x54') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.inventory', 1, 'addon:ammo7.62x54') || variable.ammo2 = query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 0, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 1, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 2, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 3, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 4, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 5, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 6, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 7, 'addon:mosin') || query.is_item_name_any('slot.hotbar', 8, 'addon:mosin');

transitions.shoot: q.property('addon:gun') == 0 && q.property('addon:gun') != 4 && q.property('addon:gun') != 5 && q.scoreboard('mosin') != 4  && query.equipped_item_any_tag('slot.weapon.mainhand','mosin') && q.is_using_item && query.all_animations_finished

transitions.shoot2: q.property('addon:gun') == 0 && q.property('addon:gun') != 4 && q.property('addon:gun') != 5 && q.scoreboard('mosin') == 4  && query.equipped_item_any_tag('slot.weapon.mainhand','mosin') && q.is_using_item && query.all_animations_finished
